# ceph_crush_rule (Data Source)

Look up an existing Ceph CRUSH rule

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ceph_crush_rule" "default" {
  name = "replicated_rule"
}

output "rule_id" {
  value = data.ceph_crush_rule.default.rule_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the CRUSH rule

### Read-Only

- `rule_id` (Number) The CRUSH rule ID
